non-prof.question: While driving, you should look at your side and rear view mirror:
choices: Not less than once per one minute

non-prof.question: You can overtake in the right side of your vehicle if:
choices: The road has two or more lanes going in one direction
non-prof.correct: The road has two or more lanes going in one direction

non-prof.question: A person who drives while under influence of alcohol or drugs is punishable by law with:
Before leaving the parking area, you should:
The minimum age in the application for Non-Professional Driver’s License is:
After overtaking, you want to safely go back to the lane where you where you came from, you should
choices: Use the rear view mirror to check the vehicle you have overtaken
Look at the vehicle you have overtaken by turning your head
non-prof.correct: Use the rear view mirror to check the vehicle you have overtaken

non-prof.question: In an intersection with a STOP sign, you should:
choices: Slow down and proceed if there is no danger
Stop and proceed if there is no danger
Give way to vehicles going from left and right, proceed if there is no danger
non-prof.correct: Stop and proceed if there is no danger

non-prof.question: A Non-Professional driver’s license is suited for:
What should you prepare for a long trip?
choices: Prepare the necessary tools that can be used to repair the vehicle
Plan your route and make sure the vehicle is running in good condition
